  • Field Details

    • protocol

      public java.lang.String protocol
      Represents the type of protocol section of the typical connection URL (mongodb,mysql, etc)

    • connectionsPerHost

      public int connectionsPerHost
      Number of concurrent connections available for the adapter to use. (Connection Pooling Feature)

    • useSsl

      public boolean useSsl
      Specifies whether the adapter should try to connect to the database using ssl

    • hosts

      protected java.util.List<com.foodmobile.databaselib.adapters.Host> hosts

    • database

      public java.lang.String database
      Primary database (schema) name to be used by the adapter

    • queryString

      public java.lang.String queryString
      Contains the query of the connection URL. This will differ per adapter.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConnectionInfo

      public ConnectionInfo()

  • Method Details

    • addHost

      public ConnectionInfo addHost​(java.lang.String hostName, int hostPort, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      To support cluster database servers, multiple hosts may be added. Note if a non-cluster enabled adapter is in use, the first host will be used to connect. There must be at least 1 host added for a successful connection.
      Parameters:
      hostName - Host address for the database server
      hostPort - Port the database server is running on
      username - Username used to authenticate with the database
      password - Password used to authenticate with the database
      Returns:
      Returns `this`, used for chaining. ex new ConnectionInfo().addHost(...) creates a connectionInfo instance and adds a host.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
